name: Fear of a blank planet
description:
Oh no! It seems like you crashed on a very strange planet...

In this adventure, with the help of your trusty satellite, you'll be able to look for the broken parts of your rocketship that got scattered around the planet!

Will you be able to succeed or will you succumb to the fear of a blank planet.

This game was made for the Coffee n' Jam game jam, an internal jam of our group, GameDev Técnico, during the period of a week.

How to play

Fear of a blank planet is a puzzle game where the objective is to gather all the missing rocketship parts that got scattered around the planet.

Using your sattelite, you'll be able to scout where those parts are and bend reality by helping *create paths* so you can reach them.

Controls
  • Switch to player view - 1
  • Movement - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Switch to sattelite view - 2
  • Moving the sattelie - drag & hold
